name: sushi
description: For the Columbia, South Carolina metro area (Richland & Lexington counties), this non-code repository has checklists of sushi menus for sushi restaurants in the area. This enables me, @RalphHightower, to check off items that I have eaten and try new sushi and sashimi menu items. Just website. No code, no libraries, applications.
author: Ralph Hightower
